contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = ''Caledoniscincus'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Scincidae]] | genus = '''''Caledoniscincus''''' }} '''''Caledoniscincus''''' is a genus of [[skink]]s (a type of [[lizard]]).<ref>http://animaldiversity.ummz.umich.edu/site/accounts/classification/Caledoniscincus.html</ref><ref>http://austmus.gov.au/pdf/publications/1295_complete.pdf</ref> ==Classification== *''[[Caledoniscincus aquilonius]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus atropunctatus]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus auratus]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus austrocaledonicus]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus chazeaui]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus constellatus]]''<ref>*{{cite journal|title=A new species of scincid lizard in the genus ''Caledoniscincus'' (Reptilia: Scincidae) from northwest New Caledonia|first=R. A.|last=Sadlier| coauthors=Whitaker, T.; Wood, P. L.; Bauer, A. M. |journal=[[Zootaxa]]|year=2012| volume=3229|pages=47â€“57| url=http://mapress.com/zootaxa/2012/f/zt03229p057.pdf}}</ref> *''[[Caledoniscincus cryptos]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus festivus]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus haplorhinus]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus orestes]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus renevieri]]'' *''[[Caledoniscincus terma]]'' ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Skinks]] {{skink-stub}}
